attributes.action: Stop generating revenue through excessive stealth taxation, with regard to Local Council Tax, Stamp duty, Hereditary Tax, and Pensions.  Also to stop penalising ordinary law abiding citizens through the excessive use of fines in general, particularly regarding motorists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a small businessman I feel that the level of government interference is creating a "nanny state". Too many rules, regulations and lust for fines are stifling my business. The level of fines that all citizens are currently experiencing for any reason are turning normally law abiding people into undeserved criminals, especially the ordinary motorist.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
